name: Jersey Devil
description: A winged, hooved monstrosity that swoops from the sky to terrorize its prey. Its bloodcurdling screams cause panic in all who hear them.

abilities.name: Blood-Curdling Scream
abilities.description: Releases a terrifying scream that causes nearby enemies to flee.

abilities.name: Dive Bomb
abilities.description: Dives at a ground target, dealing heavy damage and knocking back enemies.

abilities.name: Swooping Strike
abilities.description: First attack after moving deals bonus damage.

abilities.name: Cursed Presence
abilities.description: Enemies near the Jersey Devil have reduced healing.
